instruction: Compose an email to your teacher asking him/her a question about a missed lesson.
output:
Dear Ms. Smith, 

I hope you are doing well. I noticed that I missed one of your classes yesterday and I was wondering if I can get catch up on what I missed. Can you please provide me with the lecture slides or any other resources from the lecture? 

Thank you for your time. 

Sincerely, 
[Your Name]
